en.title: CCGPF - MooV
en.content: CCGPF is in charge of organizing summer camps for SNCF's employee children and wanted an application able to dispatch and bring them to destination safely.

en.title: HomeSend - Web Customer Care
en.content: HomeSend provides a transactions system and I helped a junior developer to remake an old Flex interface in Angular.

en.title: Elis - Portail InfoConso
en.content: Back on this project, I had to help the team to create new screens based on what we had previously done on year before. Besides, I had to handle feature-based production issues and fix them by explaining what impacts possibles solutions had.

en.title: Xerox (then Conduent) - Xerox Case Management
en.content: Xerox Case Managament addresses to call centers. It is a framework providing out-of-the-box actions that can be put together to define workflows. Moreover, custom actions can be implemented and added afterwards. We had to keep that in mind when developing new features. The frontend team and I had to offer the same experience as on the WPF client to web users.

en.title: Three Ireland - Three Plus site with Lumata technology
en.content: Three Ireland wanted to use Lumata technology to target users more efficienly with their Three Plus service, which gives discount coupons to subscribers. We had to remake their website and their mobiles apps and choe to have a common codebase using Ionic.

en.title: Elis - Portail InfoConso
en.content: Elis, a leader in public hygiene and wellness, wanted a platform to collect and analyze data sent by connected devices. We created a server able to deal with thousands of messages to extract and gather data. The website used a graphical framework we created and provided complex interfaces for administration and reporting.

en.title: Coservit - Viadéis
en.content: Coservit Viadéis provides additional modules for Sage CRM. I had to make them suitable to a new Sage CRM version which brought breaking changes. No framework were used, except for jQuery, and everything was injected by JavaScript.

en.title: Schneider - PEPs
en.content: PEPs collects and analyzes building energy consumption data. The team and I had to present these data proprely.

en.title: Viseo - Synaps
en.content: Synaps was a realtime communication application based on websockets. Its aim was to make meetings faster and more efficient. The team and I implemenetd concepts such as video conference calls through WebRTC, private and shared areas and documents, realtime slideshare.

en.title: Net Test - Training Request Module
en.content: Net Test provides linguistic formations and wanted a module to register training request from clients. I had to create and add it to an old existing website.

en.title: Mootwin (then Motwin, now Streamdata.io) - Betclic Italy
en.content: Betclic is an online sports betting service and I took part in the server-side development for its Italian version. The server had to provide webservices for iOS and Android applications using Mootwin's proprietary push protocol.
